title: "Green Elegance" Apartment for sale in Thalawathugoda
details:
Brand new unfurnished apartment on the 1st floor formed of 3 bedrooms is conveniently located close to Hokandara city surrounded by a greenish alluring environment.

The apartment under the management of Home Lands Skyline is just two minutes away from Southern expressway Athurugiriya entrance.

Apartment (1202 sqft) consists of:
- Master bedroom & attached bathroom
- 2 Bedrooms & common bathroom
- Living & dining area
-Mahogany Pantry
- Servant's area & toilet
- Premium bathware fittings
- Customized LED lighting system
- Hot water system
- parking area (including the visitors parking too)

Common facilities:
- Swimming pool & well equipped gym
- Community Hall on 7th Floor
- Spacious front area
- Round-the-clock security available with CCTV cameras

Distance from Thalawathugoda city is 3.5 km
Distance from Hokandara city is approximately 500 m

Strictly No brokers
Call us to see the apartment (Can Observe via appointment only).
